scripts.build:dna: npm run build:wasm && hc dna pack --output=../artifacts/named_real.dna workdir && hc dna pack --output=../artifacts/named_integer.dna workdir_named_integer
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack --output=../artifacts/playground.happ workdir
scripts.build:happ:clone: npm run build:dna && hc app pack --output=../artifacts/playground-clone.happ workdir_clone
scripts.start:happ: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/playground.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a playground network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://SYVd4CF3BdJ4DS7KwLLgeU3_DbHoZ34Y-qroZ79DOs8/kitsune-quic/h/165.22.32.11/p/5779/--
scripts.start:happ:clone: RUST_LOG=trace WASM_LOG=trace echo "pass" | hc s --piped -f=$ADMIN_PORT generate ../artifacts/playground-clone.happ --run=$HC_PORT -a playground-clone network --bootstrap https://bootstrap-staging.holo.host/ quic -p=kitsune-proxy://SYVd4CF3BdJ4DS7KwLLgeU3_DbHoZ34Y-qroZ79DOs8/kitsune-quic/h/165.22.32.11/p/5779/--
scripts.start: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui"
scripts.start:clone: cross-env HC_PORT=$(port) ADMIN_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ:clone" "sleep 5 && npm run start:ui"
scripts.launch: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped ../artifacts/playground.happ -w --ui-path ./dist network mdns
scripts.launch:clone: RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc launch --piped ../artifacts/playground-clone.happ -w --ui-path ./dist network mdns
scripts.package: rm -rf ui.zip && cd dist && bestzip ../ui.zip * && cd .. && hc web-app pack ./webhapp.workdir
